paragraphs.text: Minimalist cinema is related to the art and philosophy of minimalism.

paragraphs.title: Notable filmmakers
paragraphs.text: This type of film includes the works of directors like Robert Bresson,[1] Chloe Zhao,[2] Kelly Reichardt,[3] Yasujiro Ozu,[4][5] Gus van Sant,[6][7] Andy Warhol,[8] Morgan Fisher,[9] Don Hertzfeldt,[10] James Benning,[11] Jafar Panahi,[12] Jim Jarmusch,[13] Alexander Sokurov,[14] Norman McLaren,[15] Michelangelo Antonioni,[16] Hollis Frampton,[17] Peter Roehr,[18] Ernie Gehr,[19] John Cassavetes,[20] Michael Snow,[21] Larry Gottheim[22] and Abbas Kiarostami.[23][24]
